name: Reese's Book Club
description: Reese's Book Club picks spotlight stories by and about women. Every month, Reese personally selects a fiction or nonfiction book that features a strong female lead. Join millions of readers in discovering compelling, page-turning stories.

events.title: Live with Reese: Where the Crawdads Sing
events.description: Join Reese Witherspoon for an intimate discussion about this month's pick and what drew her to this powerful story.

events.title: Author Q&A: Delia Owens Live
events.description: Exclusive live Q&A session with Delia Owens - ask your questions about Where the Crawdads Sing and her writing process!

events.title: Narrator Q&A: Cassandra Campbell
events.description: Join award-winning narrator Cassandra Campbell for an exclusive Q&A about bringing Delia Owens' world to life through audio.

perks: Early access to next month's pick

membershipBonus.description: 2 extra credits for joining this month

name: Oprah's Book Club
description: Oprah's Book Club selections are transformative reads that spark meaningful conversations. For over 25 years, Oprah has connected millions of readers with powerful stories that inspire, educate, and enlighten. Each pick is a journey of discovery.

events.title: Oprah's Book Club Discussion
events.description: Join Oprah for an in-depth discussion about Educated and the power of education to transform lives.

events.title: Author Conversation: Tara Westover
events.description: Exclusive interview with Tara Westover about her remarkable journey from survivalist family to Cambridge PhD.

events.title: Community Reflection Circle
events.description: Share your own stories of transformation and discuss the themes of family, education, and self-discovery.

perks: Access to full OBC archive (25+ years)

membershipBonus.description: 3 extra credits for joining this month

name: Our Shared Shelf
description: Our Shared Shelf is Emma Watson's feminist book club. Each month we explore books that celebrate equality, challenge stereotypes, and amplify marginalized voices. Join a global community of readers committed to learning, growing, and taking action.

events.title: Feminist Friday with Emma
events.description: Emma Watson discusses Becoming and Michelle Obama's journey as a role model for women worldwide.

events.title: Activism Workshop
events.description: Turn reading into action: practical steps for gender equality inspired by this month's book.

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Read with Jenna
description: Read with Jenna brings you the best in fiction and nonfiction, featuring heartfelt stories that resonate. As part of the TODAY Show, Jenna's picks become instant bestsellers and conversation starters across America.

events.title: TODAY Show Book Club Hour
events.description: Watch Jenna discuss The Four Winds live on TODAY and join the conversation on social media.

events.title: Author Spotlight: Kristin Hannah
events.description: Kristin Hannah joins Read with Jenna to discuss her research and writing process for The Four Winds.

perks: Author Q&A with Jenna Bush Hager

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Book Club Central
description: Sarah Jessica Parker's Book Club Central celebrates literary fiction and independent voices. SJP personally curates a diverse selection of beautifully written stories that challenge perspectives and spark imagination. Discover your next favorite author.

events.title: Literary Salon with SJP
events.description: An intimate evening with Sarah Jessica Parker discussing The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue and the art of storytelling.

events.title: Author Deep Dive: V.E. Schwab
events.description: V.E. Schwab discusses the inspiration behind Addie LaRue and the craft of writing fantasy.

membershipBonus.description: 2 extra credits for joining this month

name: Mystery Lovers Society
description: Dive deep into the world of mystery and suspense with award-winning author Louise Penny. Each month we explore a different mystery or thriller, dissecting plot twists, character development, and the art of suspense.

events.title: Mystery Writing Masterclass
events.description: Learn the craft of mystery writing from Louise Penny - plot structure, red herrings, and satisfying reveals.

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Sci-Fi Sundays
description: Explore the boundaries of imagination with bestselling author Andy Weir. From hard science fiction to speculative futures, we discuss books that challenge our understanding of what's possible.

events.title: Science in Sci-Fi
events.description: Andy Weir discusses the real science behind Project Hail Mary and how to research for authenticity.

membershipBonus.description: 2 extra credits for joining this month

name: Women Who Lead
description: Join researcher and author Brene Brown as we explore books about leadership, vulnerability, and personal growth. Perfect for anyone looking to develop their authentic leadership style.

events.title: Dare to Lead Workshop
events.description: Apply Brene Brown's vulnerability and courage principles to your own leadership journey.

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Dungeon Crawler Carl Fan Club
description: Join fellow fans of Dungeon Crawler Carl in celebrating the hilarious and action-packed LitRPG series. Discuss the latest books, share fan theories, and connect with other readers who can't get enough of Carl's dungeon-crawling adventures.

events.title: Live Q&A with Matt Dinniman
events.description: Join author Matt Dinniman for an exclusive Q&A about the Dungeon Crawler Carl universe!

events.title: Fan Theory Discussion
events.description: Share your wildest theories about what happens next in the Dungeon Crawler Carl series.

perks: 40% OFF Dungeon Crawler Carl books (save up to $12)

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Asimov's Robot Chronicles
description: Explore the groundbreaking world of robotics and artificial intelligence through Isaac Asimov's classic stories. Join fellow enthusiasts in discussing the Three Laws of Robotics, the Foundation series, and Asimov's lasting impact on science fiction.

events.title: Three Laws of Robotics Deep Dive
events.description: Explore the philosophical implications of Asimov's Three Laws and their relevance to modern AI.

events.title: AI Ethics in Science Fiction
events.description: Discuss how Asimov's robot stories predicted modern AI concerns and ethical dilemmas.

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Monster Fighter's Guild
description: Dive into the action-packed world of LitRPG with Shirtaloon's He Who Fights With Monsters. Join fellow gamers and readers in discussing progression systems, world-building, and the thrill of leveling up in a game-like universe.

events.title: LitRPG Mechanics Breakdown
events.description: Analyze the progression systems and game mechanics in He Who Fights With Monsters.

events.title: Author Q&A: Shirtaloon
events.description: Live Q&A with Shirtaloon about writing LitRPG and the world of He Who Fights With Monsters!

events.title: Fan Character Builds
events.description: Share your dream character builds inspired by the book's progression system.

perks: Early access to new LitRPG releases

membershipBonus.description: 2 extra credits for joining this month

name: Gentleman Bastards United
description: Enter the shadowy world of Camorr with Scott Lynch's Gentleman Bastard series. Join fellow con artists and thieves in discussing heists, cons, and the intricate plots that make Locke Lamora one of fantasy's most beloved anti-heroes.

events.title: The Art of the Con
events.description: Learn about the psychology and planning behind great cons, inspired by Locke Lamora.

events.title: Author Q&A: Scott Lynch
events.description: Exclusive live Q&A with Scott Lynch about the Gentleman Bastard series and future plans!

perks: 45% OFF Gentleman Bastard series (save up to $13)
Early access to new Lynch works

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Fellowship of the Ring Readers
description: Journey through Middle-earth with J.R.R. Tolkien's masterpiece. Join fellow Tolkien fans in exploring the rich lore, languages, and themes of The Lord of the Rings. From the Shire to Mount Doom, discover new depths in this timeless epic.

events.title: Languages of Middle-earth
events.description: Explore Tolkien's constructed languages and their role in world-building.

events.title: Tolkien's Themes Deep Dive
events.description: Discuss power, corruption, friendship, and courage in Tolkien's masterpiece.

events.title: Middle-earth Lore Q&A
events.description: Ask questions about Tolkien's world, characters, and history with fellow experts.

perks: 55% OFF Lord of the Rings (save up to $16)

membershipBonus.description: 2 extra credits for joining this month

name: Blacktongue Brotherhood
description: Enter the grimdark world of The Blacktongue Thief with fellow fans. Discuss the plague-ridden kingdoms, complex characters, and dark humor that make this series a standout in modern fantasy.

events.title: Grimdark World-Building
events.description: Explore the dark, plague-ridden world of The Blacktongue Thief and its inspirations.

events.title: Author Q&A: Christopher Buehlman
events.description: Live Q&A with Christopher Buehlman about the Blacktongue universe and writing grimdark fantasy!

perks: 45% OFF Blacktongue Thief series (save up to $13)

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month

name: Magic University
description: Step into the magical world of Off to Be a Wizard with fellow fans. Join discussions about science vs magic, humorous fantasy tropes, and the clever world-building that makes this series a delight for fans of both genres.

events.title: Science vs Magic Debates
events.description: Discuss the fascinating interplay between scientific thinking and magical systems.

events.title: Author Q&A: Scott Meyer
events.description: Live Q&A with Scott Meyer about the Magic 2.0 series and his approach to humorous fantasy!

perks: Early access to new Magic 2.0 books

membershipBonus.description: 1 extra credit for joining this month
